Articles.Content:
Today i was once again trying to make a VTOL aircraft... and decided to try to make a stable helicopter sense VTOLs weren\'t giving me luck i had two missiles strapped to the bottom of my heli and was flying well stableish and saw that my ares-II rocket was standing on the launch pad and decided to try and hit i looped back around pressed space both flew and what happen well... RIP astronauts xD

EDIT/P.S.: just noticed their faces these guys are cannibals!!!! XD
Interesting, is it harder to control than a space plane? And what mod would that happen to be?

It\'s the Damned Aerospace part pack. Really fun. power5000, your aim is unreal! I prefer to use sunbeam lasers on my aircraft, for the autoaiming. In fact, I just built a helicopter for cleaning up debris around the KSC. I\'ve got another, dual rotor one with railguns for playing around with, but it likes to flip itself over for no good reason before getting anywhere meaningful. I see you\'ve got wings on there. Don\'t they destabilise the helicopter at high speeds? They do me. :-[

Interesting, is it harder to control than a space plane? And what mod would that happen to be?

I\'d imagine it\'s much harder. Also, the mod is Damned Aerospace, by DYJ.

Congratulations, you\'ve managed to get a ridiculously hard to control (as far as I can tell) design and shoot at a slim rocket with even slimmer rockets.

hahah thanks everyone yeah the pack is damned aerospace the missile i got from jelly cubes it\'s quite a bit harder but i think it\'s jsut a getting use to it

@G addict haha it was more of a lucky shot i think, i also use the sunbeam laser i actually have one at the nose of that aircraft (like a 30mm gun would be placed) and i have multiple planes with rail guns, 'bombs', and such

radion space works@ thanks the rocket wasnlt tooo small but not taller then the tower

if anyone is wondering the rocket i was going to launch was actually named the ares-II and it was going to be in a orbit of about 71KM with 4 rail guns each with 4 shots each devided so 16 shots that can hit kerbin if you fire at prograde ^.^ war sats FTW

They aren\'t cannibals.

They are just happy that explosives are no longer attached to their aircraft.
